typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	lastmodifieddate_f as string ('2020-11-08T12:00:00Z'),
	lastmodifieddate_t as string ('2020-11-09T00:00:00Z')
}
source(output(
		LotId as string,
		Fab as string,
		Family as string,
		Technology as string,
		Plan as string,
		Device as string,
		SourceLot as string,
		LotClass as string,
		wf_num as short,
		wf_id as string,
		Sequence as string,
		ProcStep as string,
		Stage as string,
		orig_slot as short,
		final_slot as short,
		orig_cass as short,
		final_cass as short,
		zone as string,
		zone_seat as string,
		boat_seat as string,
		subtool as string,
		equipment as string,
		trackInTime as string,
		trackOutTime as string,
		recipe as string,
		Operator as string,
		Tooling as string,
		ReworkCount as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1,
	wildcardPaths:['inbound/site/USR/WEH/*.gz']) ~> source1
source(output(
		LotId as string,
		Fab as string,
		Family as string,
		Technology as string,
		Plan as string,
		Device as string,
		SourceLot as string,
		LotClass as string,
		wf_num as short,
		wf_id as string,
		Sequence as string,
		ProcStep as string,
		Stage as string,
		orig_slot as short,
		final_slot as short,
		orig_cass as short,
		final_cass as short,
		zone as string,
		zone_seat as string,
		boat_seat as string,
		subtool as string,
		equipment as string,
		trackInTime as string,
		trackOutTime as string,
		recipe as string,
		Operator as string,
		Tooling as string,
		ReworkCount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	modifiedAfter: (toTimestamp(rtrim($lastmodifieddate_f, 'Z'), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss')),
	modifiedBefore: (toTimestamp(rtrim($lastmodifieddate_t,'Z'), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss')),
	skipLines: 1,
	wildcardPaths:['inbound/site/USR/WEH/ACMOS.2020.11.08.14.0.13.sub-ACMOS-1-1P-SG-1LMNPR-2LM-010.sub.weh.gz']) ~> source2
source2 derive(trackInTime_formated = toTimestamp(trackInTime, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		trackOutTime_formated = toTimestamp(trackOutTime, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 derive(trackInTime_formated = toTimestamp(rtrim($lastmodifieddate_f, 'Z'), 'yyyy-dd-MM\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'UTC')) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'adls',
	folderPath: 'translated/delta/site/USR/WEH',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
